title: wine_Spottswoode_2012_Lyndenhurst_Spottswoode_Estate_Cabernet_Sauvignon_(Napa_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 21457.
country: US.
description: Made from a slightly smaller percentage (81%) of estate fruit, with the intention of being approachable earlier, this wine has 19% blended in from Oakville Ranch, Knightsbridge and Young Inglewood, including 2% each of Malbec and Cabernet Franc. It jumps from the glass with yeasty black and red berry, a leathery, velvety mouthfeel and a fist of black pepper. Delicious now it should also age well, intense but bright in acidity..
designation: Lyndenhurst Spottswoode Estate.
points: 93.
price: 75.0.
province: California.
region_1: Napa Valley.
region_2: Napa.
taster_name: Virginie Boone.
taster_twitter_handle: @vboone.
title: Spottswoode 2012 Lyndenhurst Spottswoode Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley).
variety: Cabernet Sauvignon.
winery: Spottswoode.
